about_the_game:
Story Plot: After graduating from university, you couldn’t find a job due to COVID-19. Having nowhere to go, you agreed to look after your uncle’s house when he’s on his journey to travel around the world. And to earn some money, you decided to rent out the vacant rooms. Unfortunately (or fortunately), the tenants are all women. And it’s hard for a single guy like you to be living with them.

Depending on your choices, the game will lead you to one of these routes:

  • Gentleman Route: If you keep being a nice guy, you’ll be able to choose one of the women or all of them at the end of the story.

  • Pervert Route: Everyone thinks you’re a nice guy, but you’re actually a pervert.

  • Sharing Route (available from v1.3 onwards): You decide to share the women with other guys.

  • NTR Route (available from v1.3 onwards): You have to watch other guys fooling around with the women.

Landlord and the Tenants is an Erotic Visual Novel (Eroge) with multiple routes and multiple endings:

  • If you hate NTR (Netorare), you only need to stop the other guys from touching your women.

  • If you're okay with sharing, you can let the other guys have fun with your women.

  • But if you let everything get out of your control, you'll lose everything!

Notice:

  • If you can't have the endings you want, please use the walkthroughs: one with preview images (you will be able to know how to reach the scenes you want faster) or one without preview images (it won't spoil the story). The walkthroughs are in the game folder. The default location on Windows is: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Landlord and the Tenants (Nymphs).

Since Landlord and the Tenants is still being developed, the price of it in the Early Access is lower than the expected price when the full version is out:

  • v1.1 (initial release): 90% of the expected price.

  • v1.3 (add more scenes for Midori, Claire, Alexandria, Lina): 95% of the expected price.

  • v1.5 (add more scenes for the Harem Ending, the Sharing Ending, and the NTR Ending): 100% of the expected price.

The game will be automatically updated for everyone who has already been owning it. Therefore, the sooner you buy Landlord and the Tenants, the cheaper it is for you!

Thank you for playing Landlord and the Tenants.

I'm very appreciative of your feedback after playing so I can make it better in my future projects.

Regards!

content_descriptors.notes: Landlord and the Tenants is an erotic Visual Novel and is intended for adults only. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over. It contains adult language, alcohol usage, nudity, sexual themes, sexual situations, sexual penetrations. But these scenes only happen if the gamers want them. Everything depends on the gamers' choices. Nothing can happen if the gamers don't want to.

detailed_description:
Story Plot: After graduating from university, you couldn’t find a job due to COVID-19. Having nowhere to go, you agreed to look after your uncle’s house when he’s on his journey to travel around the world. And to earn some money, you decided to rent out the vacant rooms. Unfortunately (or fortunately), the tenants are all women. And it’s hard for a single guy like you to be living with them.

Depending on your choices, the game will lead you to one of these routes:

  • Gentleman Route: If you keep being a nice guy, you’ll be able to choose one of the women or all of them at the end of the story.

  • Pervert Route: Everyone thinks you’re a nice guy, but you’re actually a pervert.

  • Sharing Route (available from v1.3 onwards): You decide to share the women with other guys.

  • NTR Route (available from v1.3 onwards): You have to watch other guys fooling around with the women.

Landlord and the Tenants is an Erotic Visual Novel (Eroge) with multiple routes and multiple endings:

  • If you hate NTR (Netorare), you only need to stop the other guys from touching your women.

  • If you're okay with sharing, you can let the other guys have fun with your women.

  • But if you let everything get out of your control, you'll lose everything!

Notice:

  • If you can't have the endings you want, please use the walkthroughs: one with preview images (you will be able to know how to reach the scenes you want faster) or one without preview images (it won't spoil the story). The walkthroughs are in the game folder. The default location on Windows is: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Landlord and the Tenants (Nymphs).

Since Landlord and the Tenants is still being developed, the price of it in the Early Access is lower than the expected price when the full version is out:

  • v1.1 (initial release): 90% of the expected price.

  • v1.3 (add more scenes for Midori, Claire, Alexandria, Lina): 95% of the expected price.

  • v1.5 (add more scenes for the Harem Ending, the Sharing Ending, and the NTR Ending): 100% of the expected price.

The game will be automatically updated for everyone who has already been owning it. Therefore, the sooner you buy Landlord and the Tenants, the cheaper it is for you!

Thank you for playing Landlord and the Tenants.

I'm very appreciative of your feedback after playing so I can make it better in my future projects.

Regards!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ / SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10+
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Landlord and the Tenants (Nymphs)

  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In Landlord and the Tenants, you can have a happy ending (Romance Ending or Harem Ending), a neutral ending (Sharing Ending) or a sad ending (NTR Ending) depending on how you play.
